attributes.action: Euro tunnel restrictions on rescue dogs
attributes.additional_details: Some rescue charities are self funded and rely on volunteers to transport dogs to be rehomed, putting boundaries on the amount of dogs will not only be catastrophic to the charity but will affect the environment due to excessive traffic
attributes.background: Stop the restrictions on the amount of rescue dogs that can travel together

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
